snippet: The Long Island Power Authority said on its Web site Tuesday that it had restored power to all but 9,500 eligible customers in Nassau County and 2,400 in Suffolk County.
abstract: Long Island continues its recovery from Hurricane Sandy, but almost 12,000 eligible customers are still without power; status of recovery efforts highlighted in chart.
lead_paragraph: The Long Island Power Authority said on its Web site Tuesday that it had restored power to all but 9,500 eligible customers in Nassau County and 2,400 in Suffolk County.

headline.seo: Updates on Service Restoration on Long Island
